full_summary:
**Title**
NPP – S4610622: Temporary Help Services with the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**
The Department of National Defense (DND) is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors to provide Temporary Help Services as part of the Supply Arrangement (EN578-172870) for the National Capital Region (NCR). This request is limited to contractors who have been previously qualified under the Telecommunications analyst category and streams.

**Key Details**

* **Solicitation Number**: S4610622
* **Publication Date**: August 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 22, 2023, 3:00 PM EDT
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Description of the Requirement**
The DND requires Temporary Help Services in the form of a Telecommunications analyst. The contractor will be required to provide a resource with a minimum security level of Secret.

**Limitations and Opportunities**
This requirement is only open to contractors who have been previously qualified under the Telecommunications analyst category and streams. The following contractors have been invited to submit a proposal:

* ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
* Dare Human Resources Corporation
* Integra Networks Corporation
* Lionel Drouin
* MAKWA Resourcing Inc.
* Makwa Resourcing Inc. and Koroc Consulting Inc. in JOINT VENTURE
* MARKETBRIDGE TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
* NATTIQ INC.
* Nortak Software Ltd.
* Portage Personnel Inc.
* Protak Consulting Group Inc.
* Robertson & Company Ltd.
* SYSTEMATIX SOLUTIONS TI INC/SYSTEMATIX IT SOLUTIONS INC
* TECH4SOFT INC., Expertise Technology Consulting Inc., in joint venture
* Watershed Information Technology Inc.

**Submission Requirements**
Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Canadabuys portal by August 22, 2023, 3:00 PM EDT. The document package is available for download on the same portal.

**Contracting Entity**
Department of National Defense
Contact: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 971-7955

Please note that this document has been rewritten and some parts have been removed to
